member.name: NMREBAR
member.summary: Contains information used in handling various rebar notifications.

member.name: NMREBAR.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

summary.para: Set of flags that define which members of this structure contain valid information. This can be one or more of the following values:

listheader.description: The wID member contains valid information.
The lParam member contains valid information.
The fStyle member contains valid information.

member.name: NMREBAR.uBand
member.summary: Zero-based index of the band affected by the notification. This will be -1 if no band is affected.

member.name: NMREBAR.fStyle
member.summary: The style of the band. This is one or more of the RBBS_ styles detailed in thefStyle member of the structure. This member is only valid ifdwMask contains RBNM_STYLE.

member.name: NMREBAR.wID
member.summary: Application-defined identifier of the band. This member is only valid ifdwMask contains RBNM_ID.

member.name: NMREBAR.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the band. This member is only valid ifdwMask contains RBNM_LPARAM.
